item.title: Keras Saryan | Kamya
item.description: Kamya Kamya is my current long-term project. Set in modern-day south-eastern Europe, it is intended to be a (more or less) naturalistic and, more importantly, coherent language. I began Kamya in 2018 and have been working on it on and off ever since. It has gone on to become the most developed language I’ve worked on to date, both in terms of grammar and vocabulary. It’s also one of the projects I’m more satisfied with, hence my willingness to make material on it available.
